content.description: Sit start at the narrow left end of the shelf, and climb up through the pockets.Not in Rock Jock's Guide.
content.location: Right side of curved face in east half of area.

content.description: Climb the center of the curved face near dark streak.Problem #206 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P1.
content.location: Curved face just left of a large shelf in east half of area.

content.description: Sit start at the nice crescent-shaped edge, and climb up past pockets of varying depth.Problem #205 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P3.
content.location: West side of boulder right of the offwidth in east half of area.

content.description: Sit start at the large dish and head up the bulge past two large pockets and some monos.Problem #204 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P2.
content.location: Face just right of the large offwidth crack in east half of area, right side.

content.description: Climb the face between a vertical seam and a high large pocket (not on) past many small edges/flakes.Problem #203 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P2.
content.location: Just right of the large offwidth crack in east half of area.

content.description: Climb the nice arete, avoiding the large chunk of boulder on the ground at the start.Problem #202 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P1.
content.location: Right side of the hueco face in east half of area.

content.description: Start at the big sloped dishes and head straight up the face.Problem #201 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P2.
content.location: Just right of the biggest pocket in the east half of the area.

content.description: Match start using the lower right side of the large hueco and follow seam the angles up right.Problem #200 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P1.
content.location: The biggest pocket in the east half of the area.

content.description: Start at the big pocket just left of the bush and climb using the long sidepull edges. Careful of falling into the bush.Problem #199 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P1.
content.location: Just left of the bush in east half of area.

content.description: Starting near the two low monos (not a sit start, not mandatory to use them), climb up past the nice pockets above. Pocket down right is on if needed.Problem #198 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P1.
content.location: Second problem right of the big tree in east half of area, center of the face left of the bush.

content.description: At left end of the north face, sit start and head up a couple moves to the lower-angle top section. Large flakes to the left are off.Problem #197 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P3.
content.location: First problem right of the big tree in east half of area.

content.description: Climbs the face above the cutgrass bush, avoiding the large pocket to the right.Problem #196 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P0.
content.protection: None (please don't crush the bush with a pad)
content.location: Face left of a large tree in right half of HWS.

content.description: Starting with right hand on the long sidepull, left high in a pocket, head up.Problem #195 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P2.
content.location: Face left of a large tree in right half of HWS.

content.description: Started matched in jug pocket and head up.Problem #194 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P0.
content.location: Face left of a large tree in right half of HWS.

content.description: Start with good low right pocket, left using a mono. Head up past another big pocket.Problem #193 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P1.
content.location: Face left of a large tree in right half of HWS.

content.description: Starting at the two obvious slopers, climb the smooth face.Problem #192 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P0.
content.location: First problem at left end of the right half of HW South, after the gap between halves.

content.location: North face on the 3rd section of rock from the left, a small freestanding boulder on a shelf.

content.protection: Pad-ish, careful of the rock behind
content.location: On the 2nd "segment" of rock from the left.

content.protection: Pad-ish, careful of the rock behind

content.location: Rounded arete, left end, just right of a slot with a tree growing in it.

content.description: Climb the dark streak in the middle of the face.Problem #188 in Rock Jock's Guide, rated P1.
content.location: Center of the left end section.

content.description: A long stretch of wall with north-facing problems, a gap, and then another stretch with several more north-facing problems. A great place on warmer days, or to crank out a ton of moderates in one session.
